suncertify.protocol.client
Class SubcontractorCommandClient

java.lang.Object
  suncertify.protocol.client.SubcontractorCommandClient
public final class SubcontractorCommandClient
extends java.lang.Object

The SubcontractorCommandClient class implements the code for initializing local and remote SubcontractorCommand clients.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Kevin Short

Method Detail

remote

public static SubcontractorCommand remote(java.lang.String hostname)
                                   throws java.rmi.RemoteException,
                                          java.rmi.NotBoundException,
                                          java.net.UnknownHostException
Create a remote SubcontractorCommand client.

Parameters:
hostname - the name of the host on which the server is running.
Returns:
a reference to the new SubcontractorCommand object.
Throws:
java.rmi.RemoteException - if a communication-related exceptions occurred during the execution of a remote method call.
java.rmi.NotBoundException - if an attempt is made to lookup or unbind in the registry a name that has no associated binding.
java.net.UnknownHostException - to indicate that the IP address of a host could not be determined.

local

public static SubcontractorCommand local(java.lang.String database)
                                  throws InvalidMagicCookieException,
                                         InvalidDataHeaderException,
                                         java.io.IOException
Create a local SubcontractorCommand client.

Parameters:
database - the name of the database file.
Returns:
a reference to the new SubcontractorCommand object.
Throws:
InvalidMagicCookieException - if a database file magic cookie does not match the expected value.
InvalidDataHeaderException - if a database header is invalid.
java.io.IOException - for all other I/O exceptions.
